name: Amstel
description: Amstel is a smooth, well-balanced lager with a crisp taste and subtle malt sweetness. Crafted with premium ingredients, it delivers a clean, refreshing finish—perfect for effortless, everyday sophistication.

name: Kingfisher Strong
description: Kingsbury Strong is a bold, full-bodied lager with a smooth malt character and a crisp, powerful finish—crafted for those who enjoy strength with refined taste.

name: Carlsberg Elephant
description: Carlsberg Elephant is a strong, full-bodied lager with a rich malt depth and smooth warmth. Bold yet refined, it delivers a powerful taste experience with a clean, satisfying finish.

name: Budweizer Magnum
description: Budweiser Magnum is a strong, smooth lager with a rich malt character and bold finish. Crafted for a powerful yet refined taste, it delivers intensity balanced with signature smoothness.

name: Tuborg
description: Tuborg Mild is a smooth, easy-drinking lager with a light malt sweetness and crisp finish. Refreshing and balanced, it’s perfect for relaxed moments and effortless enjoyment.

name: Kingfisher Premium
description: Kingfisher Mild is a light, refreshing lager with a smooth malt touch and crisp finish. Easy on the palate and perfectly balanced, it’s crafted for laid-back moments and effortless enjoyment.

name: Carlsberg
description: Carlsberg Mild is a smooth, refreshing lager with gentle malt notes and a crisp, clean finish. Light and well-balanced, it offers an easygoing taste perfect for relaxed occasions.

name: Budweizer
description: Budweiser Mild is a smooth, easy-drinking lager with a light malt sweetness and clean, crisp finish. Perfectly balanced and refreshing, it’s crafted for effortless enjoyment.

name: Monts
description: Monts Mild is a light and refreshing lager with a smooth malt profile and crisp finish. Balanced and easy-drinking, it’s perfect for relaxed, everyday enjoyment.

name: Kingfisher Ultra Mild
description: Kingfisher Ultra Mild is a premium, smooth lager with a light malt touch and exceptionally crisp finish. Refined and refreshing, it’s crafted for those who enjoy subtle sophistication in every sip.
